content: section 262 sts ​ ​ work another dropped stitch section 274 sts ​ ​ work another eyelet section 346 sts ​ ​ work another dropped stitch section 358 sts ​ ​ final garter section row 1 rs k3 sm kyok k until 1 st before marker kyok sm k3 362 sts ​ row 2 ws k3 sm yo k until marker yo sm k3 364 sts ​ bind-off bind off all stitches knitwise using a stretchy bind-off method finishing weave in ends wet block shawl to finished measurements using pins or wires for the best results sit back and enjoy your masterpiece before wrapping yourself up in your new cozy shawl 7 bear lights shawl by snowy thistle knits thank you for choosing this snowy thistle knits pattern i hope you enjoy knitting and wearing your finished masterpiece for questions or feedback please contact me at snowythistleknits@gmail com i always love to see what you make please share your projects using #snowythistleknits you can find me on ravelry as snowythistleknits ​ and instagram as @snowythistleknits ​ 8
